title: Khloe Kardashian 'toying with the idea of getting back with Tristan Thompson'
text:
She took back her boyfriend after he cheated on her while pregnant - only to be let down for a second time.

Now Khloe Kardashian is considering giving Tristan Thompson a third chance at proving he can be faithful, according to a new report.

A source close to the reality star tells People magazine: 'Tristan has showed more of an interest. He seems to want more than co-parent with Khloe. It seems Khloe has moments when she is toying with the idea of getting back with Tristan.'

Time for round three? Khloe Kardashian is 'toying with the idea of getting back' with cheating ex Tristan Thompson, according to new reports

The 35-year-old reality star split with Tristan earlier this year when he kissed Kardashian family friend Jordyn Woods at a party in February.

This came just months after he was exposed as having cheated on Khloe during her pregnancy with daughter True, who was born in April last year.

According to People's source, Khloe's friends and family think she needs to find someone else to help her move on from Tristan.

The source explained: 'It seems Khloe needs a good distraction to fully move on mentally from Tristan. She needs to find a special guy, and so far, she hasn't.'

As they were: Tristan and Khloe are pictured in March of last year

Tristan has been posting flattering comments on Khloe's Instagram in recent weeks, including one which called her a 'diamond'.

He has also been spending time with their one-year-old, even posting a short video to Instagram in which True Facetimed her mom, while in his care.

The new report comes after Khloe claimed on Keeping Up With The Kardashian's that her former boyfriend tried to kiss her shortly before their daughter's birthday party in April.

Speaking on the show last month, Khloe said she had been considering not inviting the NBA star to the party because she was still 'hurt' by his betrayal.

She said: 'I still have not spoken to Tristan face-to-face. And, right now, I'm not ready to. I know I'll get to that place. Right now, it's really challenging and tough for me. I literally just had to block Tristan because ... I'm really just sick and tired of being the bigger person. I sincerely don't want him at True's party and that's not wrong of me, right?'

Doting dad: Tristan and True are seen at her April birthday party; he allegedly attempted to kiss Khloe when they got together to have a private conversation before the bash

Khloe and Tristan met off camera the day before True's party in an attempt to clear the air, but things didn't go to plan, as the Revenge Body host told her glam team he had tried to kiss her.

She said: 'And then he was like, "Can I have a hug?" And then I one-arm hugged him and he was like, "One? A one-handed hug?" I was like, "That's nice enough." And then he tried to kiss me and I go, "This is the problem with you. You can't just take what you get."... I feel like if I give an inch he takes a mile.'
description: She took back her boyfriend after he cheated on her while pregnant - only to be let down for a second time.
